Title: Source Code
Overview: When decorated soldier Captain Colter Stevens wakes up in the body of an unknown man, he discovers he's part of a mission to find the bomber of a Chicago commuter train.
Keywords: bomb, identity, fantasy, bomber, suspicion, time travel, investigation, surrealism, soldier, helicopter pilot
production_companies: The Mark Gordon Company, Vendome Pictures
Cast: Jake Gyllenhaal, Michelle Monaghan, Vera Farmiga
